thread.title: Va. lawmakers seek to expand background checks to include gun shows

title: Va. lawmakers seek to expand background checks to include gun shows
text:
03 Va. lawmakers seek to expand background checks to include gun shows 
The Washington Post: A group of Democratic lawmakers from Virginia on Thursday will unveil a 2,800-signature petition demanding expansion of background checks for gun purchasers, in the wake of a summer of violence that included the shootings of two journalists and a tourism official in Roanoke.
